samples.current_output: Vendaam. Consumer forum-la neengale directly case nadathalaam. Simple procedure, no court fee for claims up to Rs.5 lakh. Complex cases-kku lawyer udhaviyaa irukum. But mandatory illa.

Transport vehicles: Every year (8 years-kkup piragu every 6 months). Non-transport: 15 years-kkup piragu every 5 years. Test: Emission, brakes, lights, etc. Expired fitness: Rs.2,000 fine. Online booking: parivahan.gov.in.

'Welfare of child' principle - yaar better care kodukka mudiyumo avarkalukku. General preference: Below 5 years - mother. 5+ years - child's preference consider aagum. Father-kkum custody kidaikkalam if mother unfit. Joint custody possible.

samples.instruction: Flash sale-à®²à¯ order confirm à®†à®©à®¤à¯, à®ªà®¿à®±à®•à¯ cancel à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®¾à®™à¯à®• - legal-à®†?
samples.current_output: Unilateral cancellation after confirmation unfair trade practice à®†à®•à¯à®®à¯. Consumer forum-à®²à¯ complaint à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà®²à®¾à®®à¯. Price difference + compensation à®•à¯‡à®Ÿà¯à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯. 'Out of stock' excuse valid à®…à®²à¯à®² - stock management seller responsibility.

samples.instruction: Fake product vitra e-commerce site-kku case podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Counterfeit/fake products virpathu illegal. Consumer forum-la compensation claim seyyalam. Trademark owner-kkum report pannalam. Police complaint (IPC 420 - cheating) podalam. E-commerce platform-um liable.

When needed: Bank accounts, shares, securities claim seyya. Will illaadha cases-kku. Apply: District Court. Documents: Death certificate, legal heir proof, asset details. Fee: Asset value based. Time: 3-6 months. Alternative: Nominee-aa irundhaal thevai illa.

Formula: 15 days average pay Ã— years of service. Applicable: 100+ employees company, 1 year+ service. Notice: 3 months advance or 3 months pay. LIFO principle (Last In First Out) follow à®†à®•à®£à¯à®®à¯. Re-employment preference à®‰à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯.

Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 26 weeks paid leave (first two children), 12 weeks (third child onwards). Before delivery: 8 weeks max. Adoption/surrogate: 12 weeks. Miscarriage: 6 weeks. 10+ employees company-kku applicable. Creche facility mandatory (50+ employees).

samples.instruction: RTI endraal enna? Yaar file pannalaam?
samples.current_output: RTI = Right to Information Act 2005 - Government information perum urimai. Any Indian citizen file pannalam. NRI, Company, Trust - file panna mudiyaadhu. Government, PSU, government-funded NGO ellaathukkum RTI apply.

samples.instruction: Fake news share à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®©à®¾à®²à¯ legal trouble à®µà®°à¯à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Yes, possible: IPC 505 (public mischief), 153A (promoting enmity), Epidemic Diseases Act (health misinformation). IT Rules 2021: Platforms must remove fake news. Knowingly spreading = higher liability. Before sharing: Verify from trusted sources. Fact-check websites use à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•.

1) Cyber Crime portal: cybercrime.gov.in (national), 2) Local Cyber Crime police station, 3) 1930 helpline (financial fraud), 4) Bank-kku immediately inform. Screenshots, transaction details, communication records - ellam save pannunga. 24 hours-kkul report panninaal money recover chance adhigam.

samples.instruction: Police station-la complaint kudukka poren, enna pannanum? (Chennai casual)
samples.current_output: Mudhalla enna nadandhuchunnu clear-aa ezhudhi vachukonga. ID proof, evidence (photos, messages) eduthutu ponga. FIR copy kelunga - free-dhaan. Register panna maruttha SP office-kku complaint podunga. Calm-aa irunga.

Options: 1) Ration shop-la complaint book, 2) Taluk Supply Officer, 3) District Supply Officer, 4) Food helpline: 1967, 5) TNCSC website. Issues: Fake entries, quantity shortage, quality issues, dealer misbehavior. Aadhaar seeding problems: UIDAI + DSO.

CARA rules: 1) Age: 25-55 years, 2) Married couple: 2 years stable marriage, 3) Single parent: allowed (restrictions apply), 4) Income: sufficient to raise child, 5) Medical: physically/mentally fit, 6) No criminal record. Age difference with child: max 45 years.

Rights: 1) Maintenance (permanent alimony), 2) Streedhan (gifts given at marriage), 3) Share in husband's property (if jointly acquired), 4) Child custody preference (especially below 5 years), 5) Residence right till divorce. Interim maintenance during case nadakkumbodhe kidaikkum.

Varies by industry and skill level. Unskilled: Rs.410-450/day, Semi-skilled: Rs.430-500/day, Skilled: Rs.480-600/day (approximate, 2024). Labour Department website-à®²à¯ exact rates. Less à®•à¯Šà®Ÿà¯à®¤à¯à®¤à®¾à®²à¯ Labour Inspector-à®•à¯à®•à¯ complaint.

samples.instruction: Single mother rights ennenna? Documents-la father name venumaa?
samples.current_output: Rights: 1) Birth certificate - mother name only acceptable, 2) School admission - father name not mandatory (Supreme Court), 3) Passport - mother as sole guardian okay, 4) Aadhar - single parent sufficient. Challenges: Some private institutions insist - quote Supreme Court judgment. Government schemes: Single mother pension available in TN. Child custody: Automatic to mother (unwed).

samples.instruction: Guideline value endraal enna? Enge check panrathu?
samples.current_output: Government nirnnayitha minimum property value - idhukku keezhe register panna mudiyaadhu. Check: tnreginet.gov.in â†’ Guideline Value Search â†’ Zone/Village select. Actual sale higher-aa irundhaal actual value-kku stamp duty.

samples.instruction: Online-à®² à®ƒà®ªà¯à®°à®¾à®Ÿà¯ à®†à®¯à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯‡à®©à¯, police-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®ªà¯‹à®©à®¾ à®’à®´à¯à®™à¯à®•à®¾ case à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà¯à®µà®¾à®™à¯à®•à®³à®¾?
samples.current_output: Cyber crime special cell à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯ - trained officers. cybercrime.gov.in-à®²à¯ first complaint à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà¯à®™à¯à®• - track à®†à®•à¯à®®à¯. Local police-à®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯ FIR à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà¯à®™à¯à®•. Both simultaneously à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®²à®¾à®®à¯. Evidence (screenshots, bank statements) ready-à®† à®µà®šà¯à®šà¯à®•à¯à®•à¯‹à®™à¯à®•.

Internal Complaints Committee (ICC)-kku written complaint. ICC illaattal Local Complaints Committee (District level). Time limit: 3 months from incident. POSH Act 2013 protection. Anonymous complaint-um valid. Retaliation-kku protection undu.

Aama. Grounds: Undue influence, fraud, forgery, unsound mind, improper execution. Contest: Probate Court. Time: Before probate granted-kku ethirppu, after = revocation suit. Evidence: Medical records, witnesses, handwriting expert. Burden of proof: Contestant.

Complaint options: 1) EPFO portal: EPFiGMS (online grievance), 2) Regional PF Commissioner office, 3) Labour Commissioner. Employer liability: PF amount + 12% interest + damages (up to 100%). Criminal prosecution-um possible. Salary slip-la PF deduction check pannunga.

samples.instruction: Workplace-la sexual harassment, POSH Act enna solluthu?
samples.current_output: POSH Act 2013 (Prevention of Sexual Harassment): 1) Every office with 10+ employees - Internal Committee (IC) irukkanum, 2) Complaint: IC-kku 3 months-kkul, 3) Inquiry: 90 days-kkul complete, 4) Action: Transfer, warning, termination. No IC: Local Committee-kku complaint. Retaliation protection undu. Anonymous complaint-um valid.

Responsibilities: Registration (some municipalities), vaccination, leash in public, damage liability. Pet cruelty: PCA Act - 3 months imprisonment + Rs.100 fine (old law, amendments pending). Noise nuisance: Neighbour complaint valid. Banned breeds: Check local rules.
